name: Pro Spin - Fidget Spinner
description:
Spinner is a toy that allows you to relax, get away from unnecessary thoughts and worries, immerse yourself in a state of easy meditation and appeasement. Monotonous actions that you do by hand distract your brain from unnecessary thoughts and concentrate, allowing you to relax and rest.
Use the spinner in the subway, or spin your spinner while standing in a traffic jam, at home, resting in front of the TV, or before you go to bed.
Do not use the app when you are at an important meeting, at a school lesson or lecture at the institute, or elsewhere where your full attention is required. Remember, this toy relaxes you and distracts, use it wisely.
